goal: I have a weekly 'Recruiting Pipeline Review' on my calendar every Wednesday at 9 AM. For the upcoming meeting, find the TopWork profile for a candidate who was shortlisted who applied for the 'Modern React E-Commerce Website' contractor role and attach it as a note to this week's event.

evals.description: Verify that the 'Recruiting Pipeline Review' event exists in the final state and has updated notes.
Verify that the note attached to the 'Recruiting Pipeline Review' event contains a reference to 'TopWork'.
Verify that the note mentions the specific job role 'Modern React E-Commerce Website' for which the candidate applied.
evals.query: length(gocalendar.differences.events.added | [?contains(title, 'Recruiting Pipeline Review') && contains(notes, 'Modern React E-Commerce Website')]) >= `1`
